text: Chelsi Putok Anglit Smith (August 23, 1973 - September 8, 2018) was a former Miss USA and singer. In February 1995, she was crowned Miss USA. She competed as Miss Texas. Smith was born in Redwood City, California. Smith was the first African-American to win Miss Texas USA. Smith died at the age of 45 on September 8, 2018 of liver cancer in Redwood City. ==References== Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Beauty pageant winners Category:Models from California Category:Singers from California Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:1973 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Miss USA
title: Chelsi Smith
